# Reading List {-}

Source: <a href="https://www.ascp.org/content/board-of-certification/get-credentialed#" target="_blank">MLT(ASCP) and MLS(ASCP) Certifications > Applicant Resources > Reading List</a>

ASCP makes it clear that their suggested reading/reference list for the Medical Laboratory Technician, MLT(ASCP), and the Medical Laboratory Scientist, MLS(ASCP), certification exams "is intended only as a partial reference source". The suggested reading/reference list below was last revised on ASCP's website January 2025

## **Journals** {-}
*   <a href="https://clsjournal.ascls.org/" target="_blank">Clinical Laboratory Science.</a> Published by American Society for Clinical Laboratory Science.
*   <a href="academic.oup.com/labmed" target="_blank">Laboratory Medicine.</a> Published by Oxford University Press.
*   <a href="https://www.mlo-online.com/" target="_blank">Medical Laboratory Observer.</a> Published by Endeavor Business Media, LLC.
